entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
